cards.name: Meera Reed
cards.text: Shadow (1). Stealth. Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is sacrificed, return Meera Reed to shadows. Reaction: After Meera Reed comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
cards.designer: Card design by 2010 Castle Stahleck Champion, Andrea Gualdoni.

cards.name: Shaggydog
cards.text: [stark] character you control only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, the losing opponent must choose and kill a defending character. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Shaggydog to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Mark Mullendore
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Mark Mullendore is participating, reveal the top card of your deck. You may put that card into play. If you do, place Ser Mark Mullendore on top of your deck (cannot be saved).
cards.flavor: Ser Mark Mullendore brought a black-and-white monkey and fed him morsels from his own plate...

cards.name: Bonds of Chivalry
cards.text: Action: Choose a participating Knight character you control. Stand it and remove it from the challenge. Then, you may kneel another Knight character you control to have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: Jon Snow
cards.text: While you control a: - Builder character, Jon Snow gains stealth. - Ranger character, Jon Snow gains intimidate. - Steward character, Jon Snow gains insight.
cards.flavor: "I am lord commander because my brothers chose me."

cards.name: Lord Commander
cards.text: [thenightswatch] character with printed cost 5 or higher only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating [thenightswatch] character, attached character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Shireen Baratheon
cards.text: Shadow (3). Action: During a challenge in which Shireen Baratheon is participating, choose a participating character. That character and Shireen Baratheon do not contribute their STR to the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Privileged Position
cards.text: Play only if you have not lost a [power] challenge this round. Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event or triggered location ability would initiate, cancel those effects.

cards.name: Tithe Collector
cards.text: Reaction: After you collect income, pay 2 gold to have Tithe Collector gain 1 power. +1 Income.

cards.name: Clever Feint
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose any number of cards you control with shadow. Return each of those cards to shadows.

cards.name: Victarion Greyjoy
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel a Warship location to (choose 1): - choose and kneel a location. - stand Victarion Greyjoy. - have Victarion Greyjoy gain renown until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Grey Ghost
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Grey Ghost to choose 1 character (up to 2 characters instead if Grey Ghost came out of shadows this phase). Until the end of the phase, each chosen character cannot be declared as a defender.

cards.name: Rhaegal
cards.text: Ambush (5). No attachments. Reaction: After an opponent's character is killed by a card effect, stand Rhaegal.
cards.flavor: Thus far the green dragon had shown himself to be more dangerous than the white.

cards.name: Meereenese Market
cards.text: Action: Kneel Meereenese Market to choose a card in a discard pile and place it on the bottom of its owner's deck. +1 Income.

cards.name: House Manwoody Guard
cards.text: While you are not the first player, each Guard character you control does not kneel when declared as a defender.

cards.name: A Mission in Essos
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Remove all but the bottom card of your deck from the game facedown. Then, shuffle your discard pile into your deck and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Wun Wun
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel Wun Wun to have him participate in a challenge in which you control a participating Wildling character.
cards.flavor: This giant ate no meat at all, though he was a holy terror when served a basket of roots, crunching onions and turnips and even raw hard neeps between his big square teeth.

cards.name: Poisoned Coin
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which you control an attacking character with shadow, place a poison token on a character without shadow controlled by the losing opponen. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: The Free Folk
cards.text: Your plot deck and draw deck can only include neutral cards. Reaction: After claim is applied for a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, kneel your faction card to apply the claim of another challenge type.

cards.name: Winter Reserves
cards.text: While Winter Reserves is in your used pile, increase the gold value and reserve value on your revealed Winter plot card by 1.
